trans-unit.source: Encapsulates an array and an offset within the specified array.
Can be used as an argument to a native method reached through platform invoke.
In this case, the platform invoke marshaler will retrieve the starting address of the array, add the offset, and pass the resulting pointer to the underlying native function.
This structure only supports arrays containing no references, such as primitive type arrays and value type arrays containing only fields of primitive types.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset"></xref> structure.
A managed array.
The offset in bytes, of the element to be passed through platform invoke.
The array is larger than 2 gigabytes (GB).
Indicates whether the specified object matches the current <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset"></xref> object.
Object to compare with this instance.
`true` if the object matches this <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset"></xref> object matches the current instance.
An <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset"></xref> object to compare with this instance.
`true` if the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset"></xref> object matches the current instance; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the managed array referenced by this <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset"></xref>.
The managed array this instance references.
Returns a hash code for this value type.
The hash code for this instance.
Returns the offset provided when this <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset"></xref> was constructed.
The offset for this instance.
Determines whether two specified <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset"></xref> objects have the same value.

The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset.Equals%28System.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset%2CSystem.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset%29?displayProperty=fullName>
An object to compare with the b parameter.
An object to compare with the a parameter.
`true` if the value of a is the same as the value of b; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether two specified <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset"></xref> objects no not have the same value.

The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset.Compare%28System.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset%2CSystem.Runtime.InteropServices.ArrayWithOffset%29?displayProperty=fullName>
An object to compare with the b parameter.
An object to compare with the a parameter.
`true` if the value of a is not the same as the value of b; otherwise, `false`.
